content: As an AI language model with no personal opinions, beliefs, or feelings, I cannot determine whether Batman's contingency plans were necessary or constituted a breach of trust. The decision ultimately depends on one's perspective. Some might argue that preparing for worst-case scenarios shows diligence and preparation, while others might view it as a betrayal of trust and an indication that Batman doesn't fully trust his allies. It is worth noting that the storyline of Batman's contingency plans was a popular comic book arc that explored the nature of loyalty among superheroes, particularly in situations where they face difficult moral dilemmas. Ultimately, each individual will have to form their own opinion on the matter, considering the context and their own personal values.
